name: Dahilayan Adventure Park
description: A thrill-seekerâ€™s paradise located in Manolo Fortich, Bukidnon offering activities such as zipline, luge, and other outdoor adventures amidst cool mountain air.

name: Camp Phillips
description: A charming community built around the Del Monte pineapple plantation known for its huge pineapple landmark and rich agricultural heritage.

name: Cinchona Forest Reserve
description: A serene forest area known for its scenic canopy walkway, lush greenery, and biodiversity ideal for nature lovers and eco-tourists.

name: Mangima Canyon
description: A breathtaking canyon view located in Manolo Fortich featuring deep gorges and lush landscapes that provide a perfect spot for photography and sightseeing.

name: Kampo Ni Juan
description: A cozy type of old house for tourists that offers a glimpse into the past with its rustic architecture and relaxing countryside ambiance.

name: Alpine Village
description: A European-inspired village nestled in the highlands of Bukidnon featuring cozy retreats, nature exploration, and picturesque surroundings.
